message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this valuable product. I believe it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to start with a price of $1100000.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to negotiate further. I'm willing to pay $900000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to me.

I understand you're looking to negotiate further, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $950000. It's a compromise that I'm willing to make to move the deal forward.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $920000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the value I'll get from it.
I understand you're trying to save some money, Bob. However, I've already compromised quite a bit. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $970000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to consider.

I understand that you've compromised a lot, Alice, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. I'm willing to pay $930000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the value I'll get from it.
